aththatama ow age mawa polanthaye awutswich kandawuredi miya giyath piya diwi bera gannata samath wenawa.ee 1945 janawari 27 wanada ema kandawura rusiyanu hamuda nidahas karaganna nisawen.ada age me amstardam hi pihiti niwasa kauthukagarayak.barjan belsan kandawureth age samaruwak thiyenawa.@ninuoya aan gana satahan karamin karala thiyana pasu satahanata mama godak kamathiyi.eekamayi mama niwaradima thorathuru liyala giye.mokada boho denek aththatama me dewal gana nodanna bawa mata watahila thiyanawa.anith karanaya thama mama mechchara dawas nawaththala thibuna me wage thorathuru liyana satahana aayemath patan ganna oona kiyala mata hithuna.me parana liyu satahana ..eeth aayemath aluthenma patan ganna oone.

alpitiyedi imbaulapitiya samuha wyaparaye adhipathi jinasena horawala withana mahatha wisin wasara 22 k nokadawa sidu kala budusarana pathra saha dinamina wesak kalapa bedadima mewarath wesak pura pasaloswaka pohoya nimiththen sidu kirimata katayuthu yoda atha.ee anuwa pradeshaye pujaniya sthana kihipaka sil samadan wana uwasi uwasiyan athara budusarana pathra 500 k mewara bedadimata niyamithaya.thawada, goluwamulla shri sudarshinarama yedi maranayata kapawu gawayan thideneku nidahas kirimatada niyamithawa atha.kurundugaha hathapma awata wiharasthanayanhi ha jayabima galagodaantha samadhi wiweka senasanaye pehewas samadanwana upasaka upasikawan sandaha wesak poho dina ‘budusarana ‘ puwathpath dharma danaya washayen bedadimata katayuthu yoda atha.kurundu gaha hathapme somadasa nanayakkara mahatha wisin para losapath thama demawpiyan wana en.dab.ji.piyasena mahatha saha em.em.withanachchi mahathmiyata pin pinisa doloswana waratath ema ‘budusarana ‘ dharmadanaya sidu kere.sinigoda mawpiya puja upahara ata wisi budu madure mema wesak sathiya thula atawisi buddha pujawa pawathwimata saha pamina wandana karana siyalu dena wetha wesak budu sarana pathraya bagin beda dimata budu madure nirmathru piyadi gamage chandrapala da silwa mahatha katayuthu sanwidhana kara atha.1985 mayi 14 anuradhapura shri maha bodhiya asala di wedi wadi miya giya dayabara maniyan wu es.ke. ransinona mahathmiya saha 1964.04.19 miya giya widuhalpathi pi.pi.da.silwa soyurananda sihikara 1987 wesak po dina sita mema budusarana pathra dharma dana pujawa piyadi gamage chandrapala da silwa sidu karanu labe.beligala wakada padinchi ee.es. samarasinha mahatha nomilaye wesak budusarana pathra uposhatha ashtanga shilaya samadan wana siyalu pinwathun udesa pradanaya kirimata katayuthu yoda atha.

janadhipathiwaraya polis wishaya bhara amathyawaraya lesa polisiyata nayakathwaya labadunda sita wishala washayen mathdrawya athadanguwata ganima ha mathdrawya jawaramkaruwan athadanguwata ganima sidukerena bawath, ohu polisiyata nisi lesa nayakathwaya labademin adala katayuthu sidukalada, swadhina komishan sabha athi kirima hethuwen eya siduwana bawata eksath jathika pakshaye atham piris sandahan karana bawath nidahas pakshaya mehidi pawasa sitiyeya. 19 wana aandukrama wyawastha sanshodhanaya haraha polisiya athulu swadhina komisan sabha path kirima hethuwen merata maha parimana mathdrawya jawaram watalimata haki wu bawa agamathi ranil wikramasinha mahatha pereda (25) prakasha kaleya.
